parameters.name: prestime
parameters.description: how long to do the presentation, in ms

parameters.name: spread
parameters.description: How many pixels left and right of the centerline will the stimuli be

parameters.name: stepsize
parameters.description: How big of a step to make after judgement?

parameters.name: randomstep
parameters.description: How much randomness to include in step?

parameters.name: diff
parameters.description: start diff value.  It should be somewhat negative.
